title: 06/15/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kawhi Leonard, 76ers, KD vs LeBron
itunes:title: 06/15/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kawhi Leonard, 76ers, KD vs LeBron
description:
In hour 1, Colin recaps the Clippers and Utah, Kawhi is the clutch player you need. The 76ers have issues with their stars. Is KD maybe to impulsive for his own good and Ric Bucher joins to talk NBA Playoffs and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
